channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-12786] "hadoop key" command usage is not documented
item.description:
I found "hadoop key" command usage is not documented when reviewing HDFS-9784.
In addition, we should document that uppercase is not allowed for key name.
item.summary: "hadoop key" command usage is not documented

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Thanks ajisakaa for filing this. I'd like to work on this one, and gain more knowledge.

Attached patch 1 to add documentation. The usage part is copied from the command usage directly (found a typo there, corrected), adapting to the markdown format. Also attached a generated html for easier reviewing.

The reason that HDFS-9784 saw the exception is due to a KeyProvider's precondition check.

Please see if the document makes sense. Thank you!

Thanks xiaochen for creating the patch. Mostly looks good to me.
One nit: There are some incorrect brackets matching.

roll keyname [-provider provider] [-help]]

delete *keyname* [-provider *provider*] [-f] [-help]]

[list [-provider *provider*] [-metadata] [-help]]

Would you fix them?

Thanks ajisakaa for reviewing!
Sorry I missed that, patch 2 fixes it. Also updated the description of the subcommands to not say 'The xxx subcommand' to be consistent with other commands.
